meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Donna Innes Dilip Rajagopalan Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6822.

td.p: Donna Innes, a criminal defense attorney from Kalamazoo, Michigan
Dilip Rajagopalan, a data scientist from Newtown Square, Pennsylvania
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,605)

tr.td: I'VE GOT TIME
ON MY HANDS
FOOD-TITLED BOOKS
TOP 40 DEBUTS
ROBOTICS
D MINUS
(Alex: Each correct response will be two words--one word is lacking a "D", otherwise they are identical.)

Julia
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Julia
Dilip
Donna
(Alex: The Clue Crew deals with...)
SOUTH AFRICAN WILDLIFE
CROSSWORD CLUES "O"
(Alex: Each correct response beginning with that letter.)
U.S. BODIES OF WATER
CHANGING WHITE HOUSE TOWEL MONOGRAMS
(Alex: We'll give you the monogram for a president, you give us the monogram for the president's successor.)
COLLEGES, NOT UNIVERSITIES
THE WIT & WISDOM OF W.C. FIELDS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
